channel.title: Updates on Nathaniel Saul | Around About
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Nathaniel Saul | Around About

item.title: I presented my work on stitching mappers together at the Sympossium on Computational Geometry's Young Researchers Forum. The work was in collaboration with Bei Wang and Bala Krishnamoorthy and we plan on releasing complete work soon..

My work on stitching mappers together along filter functions was accepted to the Symposium on Computational Geometry's Young Researchers Forum. (In collaboration with Bei Wang and Bala Krishnamoorthy.)
I won second place at WSUV Research Showcase for my talk on exploring high-dimensional data with Mapper.
I was awarded the NASA Space Grant Fellowship to apply TDA to classifification of galaxies.
I have accepted an internship with the Visual Analytics group at Pacific Northwest National Laboratories for the summer 2018.
I passed my Graduate Qualifying Exams!
